nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. It was written by Alyssa Wong, illustrated by Marika Cresta, and published by Marvel Comics on July 22, 2020. The issue features the story "Fortune and Fate Part 2: Haunted," in which Doctor Aphra and her new crew travel to the planet Dianth in search of the Rings of Vaale.

BEWARE THE MAD CITY! DOCTOR APHRA and her new team have tracked the RINGS OF VAALE to a mysterious planet filled with primordial horror. What's worse, the rings may be cursed…a malediction that could already be tearing Aphra's crew apart. Will they escape the terror of the cursed planet with the precious rings or succumb to the creeping madness pervading the ancient world?
Doctor Aphra 2 was initially solicited for an April 29, 2020 release, but it was delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
